oai_dc:dc.dc:descriptions: The near approach of a 'Commando' is heralded by a mist. In the Katkop dialect, by Díä!kwãin (L V.
5205). The |xam can tell when a commando is coming to attack them by the mist that comes in the morning.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: How the approach of a commando is foretold by the mist
